snippet: The funeral for Charles Albert Poland Jr., who saved as many children as he could when a kidnapper boarded his bus last week, drew hundreds.
abstract: Funeral service for Charles Albert Poland Jr, bus driver who saved as many children as he could when a kidnapper boarded his bus in Midland City, Ala, draws hundreds; Jimmy Lee Dykes boarded bus demanding that Poland hand over two young children; Poland blocked Dykes way as the children escaped and Dykes then shot him four times and took one young boy whom he is holding hostage in an underground bunker.
lead_paragraph: The funeral for Charles Albert Poland Jr., who saved as many children as he could when a kidnapper boarded his bus last week, drew hundreds.
